channel.title: vortex on Biotop Science Collective
channel.description: Recent content in vortex on Biotop Science Collective

item.title: Vortex_ Exhibition Extended & Date for Finissage
item.description: Extension of the Exhibition Over 22 evenings, around 650 people have visited our exhibition. This is a remarkable succes for us. Due to ongoing interest in the exhibition, we’ve decided to extend it until 14.02.2020. Opening Hours Regular opening hours are Thu-Sat between 5 and 8 pm. Additionally, we’re also happy to open our doors at other times upon arrangement via email to info@biotop.co. Wo? Former “Rollin’ Skate Shop”, Oberer Kirchenplatz 4, Villach

item.title: Vortex
item.description: When: 07th December 2019 - 25th January 2020; Thu, Fri, Sat, 5-8 pm and upon arrangement Where: Former “Rollin’ Skate Shop”, Oberer Kirchenplatz 4, Villach We are surrounded by and take part in complex systems. Yet, we struggle with the consequences of complexity. The global financial system and the climate are two examples of complex systems that inevitably affect our daily lives. Due to their apparent impenetrability, they make us feel insecure.
